about_the_game:
The Logic World Original Soundtrack is a 10-track, 42-minute original soundtrack written for Logic World.

Logic World is a game about building circuits. The original soundtrack will keep you company as you puzzle through logic problems and build wondrous computing machines. These ten inspiring pieces are all about the beauty and awe of digital circuitry.

We really hope you enjoy our music. Sit back, relax, and dream of emergent mathematical marvels.

name: Logic World Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1000 MB available space

short_description: The Logic World Original Soundtrack is a 10-track, 43-minute original soundtrack written for Logic World.
